project.name: Falk Mobile
project.description: The Falk mobile app is a combination of Falk's excellent POI data, and Bing Maps' fluid mobile mapping.
project.what_we_did: Railslove developed a responsive and image-less interface based on mockups. For this, all image-based designs were reworked to CSS3, utilizing HTML5 elements. All animations are GPU-accelerated and buttery smooth, thanks to CSS 3D transforms. This work were done together with our friends 9elements.
